content.detailedDescription: I arrived early to work tuesday the 2nd nov 2010 at 0600 hrs and had just sat in the vehicle for a min or two, when i noticed how clear the sky was and rolled down the window. i thought i would rest my neck on the ledge of the open window of the door of the truck and enjoy the stars for a few mins, then all of a sudden this huge v shaped object came into sight directly above my line of vision above. the lights i could not count because of the speed it was traveling it was soundless, i counted 12 in the time i had. the two front lights at the front of this craft were moving seperatley from the rest as if putting on a show, ie side to side as though they were crossing. at this point i jumped out of the truck and watched as it continued it's forward path. the color of the lights were like a black light effect, dark red to purple but not bright bright the speed of this craft was about 1000 to 1500 miles per hr i guessed this as we have vancouver airport in the direction this craft was flying towards, and we see regular high and low flying aircraft over this commercial industrial estate daily. at this time however there were no aircraft in the sky. the size of this craft i can only say was huge and we don't have anything that big and fast, i did not notice other stars being blocked out. i have no idea how high this object was but i would estimate it at regular aircraft flying height 25000 30000 ft the direction this craft was flying was south west my head was facing east the address i was parked at 4077 mcconnell drive burnaby, bc. canada. truck hood facing south, parked west side pavement......... i did have a camera on board and alway's do because of my job.... but this was so quick i did not even have time to think....... size i would estimate at football field.....
content.summary: Ufo passed direcly overhead of me whilst i was parked at work

content.detailedDescription:
This is very similar to this event... *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg).

however, i want to add that it appeared to be moving slower than the relative speed of other aircraft in the sky. there were at least 4 commercial jets commercial jets flying overhead all with contrails.  it did not have a contrail.  it did not make any noise.  i believe the orange glow that i saw which is also in the other reports was from the sunlight as it (the sun) was hanging below my horizon, but it was brighter than other aircraft.  my first thought was that it was a satellite, but it was too early in dusk.  it came from the southwest and was moving northeast for a few minutes.  i turned away to answer the waitress and looked back, it was gone.  it shouldn���t have been gone as when i turned away it was near the center of the sky.  i continued looking for it over the next 20-30 minutes to no avail.  

1.)  sitting outside having dinner at a resteraunt.
2.)  it was slightly brighter than other aircraft reflecting the sun���s light (as it was near dusk).  i didn���t see any wings, hear any noise from it, and it was the only object without contrails
3.)  blimp
4.) see above.
5.) irrelevant, but observed it in curiousity.
6.) see above.
content.summary: Slowly moved from sw towards ne

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my front yard in upper yucaipa, california watching a commercial jet heading south overhead (which was odd because they generally go west), then it suddenly turned to head west.  immediately after that i saw a white sphere heading north across the plane's path.  i watched the sphere as it continued north and then it suddenly vanished.  i noticed the object because i was curious about why the jet was flying south.  when i first noticed the sphere i thought it might be a fighter jet or some small fast aircraft because of the speed.  i have never seen even a small jet move that fast from such a distance.  my next thought was that i saw a ufo, especially because of the plane's reaction to it, and how it just disappeared.  it might be something very normal, but i'd really like to know just what that would be.
content.summary: I saw a small white sphere heading north at a high speed, with a commercial jet seeming to dodge it.

content.detailedDescription: Walking off front porch..Shooting star like thing with a trail of white behind it. quiet and dissapeared very fast...No planes in sight!
content.summary: Walking outside

content.detailedDescription: 11/01/2010 approximately 2:00 p.M.  my friend and i were outside talking on separate phone calls when my friend pointed out a "daytime star".  being 2:00 approximately i found it odd.  we had seen a similar thing a few months ago and we got a very rudimentary telescope which, when focused on the stationary object in the sky, turned out to be 3 spheres. this time we brought out the big telescope. when we finally found the object and this time it was actually moving at a quick clip.  although moving we were able to track it and because of the better equipment were able to see that it was a red sphere with two white spheres going around it.  shortly thereafter it was out of our sight.
content.summary: 3 x spheres in upper atmosphere: center sphere red in color; two outside spheres white in color.

content.detailedDescription:
We were preparing for a halloween party in sheffield, uk on the sunday afternoon, 31st october. my partner, diana noticed an intense flash of light in the room for a second. i carried on cooking and it happened twice more in the afternoon. i thought it was a power surge or a failing long life bulb.

i listened to a radio 4, bbc report on the radio the next day about iridium satellites as can't and i don't believe in ufo's. it talked about flashes of light but i don't think this matches the description, as the light filled the room.

i felt that it could be a power surge but no fuses blew! our lights blow very easily in our old system. 

i would like to know if there were any other such experiences at the time.

i had previously, during the summer found some melted rock on the lawn that looked like either a meteorite or steel slag which is common here. it caught on the blade of the mower and wasn't there the night before. sheffield now has no geologist in their museum. i'm planning to take it to leeds.

jim
content.summary: Triple flash within about 2 hours at intervals. flashed into a dark kitchen. thought it was a failing tube but it is still opperating. witnessed by my wife on one burst.

content.detailedDescription: I suspect this can all be explained but last thursday, october 28, at 5:45pm me and my 3yr old son were driving home on pacific coast highway heading north and there was a strange drop-down cloud that had several spirals inside. this drop-down cloud (for lack of a better term) was very bright.  to the south of this drop-down cloud was a large round bright circle shining through the clouds. this was strange to me because it was a definitive circle.  in one photo there appears to be a greyish orb like thing in the sky next to the bright bright cirle.  i did not see this orb like thing until i looked at my photo's.   anyway, i thought it was odd enough to take some pictures.  thanks [witness name removed cms/dr]
content.summary: Weird drop-down cloud with swirling pattern inside, a large round brightness in a the sky near the drop-down cloud.  see photo's

content.detailedDescription: On date the sky to the east had a bank of black clouds to the west was clear saw an object shining from the sun from the east coming out of the clouds for a minute then turn black estimated about 26,000ft then continuing towards the west kept climbing over my view uintil out of singt no sound no jetstream behind it
content.summary: Saw the object for about 2 min.

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving from bloomington to indianapolis down road 37 and highway 465. when i first noticed something i saw a diagonal line of 5 lights across the sky in the distance. i thought maybe they were lights from towers or something, but when i got close to one i noticed it was not. it was a triangular shaped craft that was hovering. it had lights on all three points, and on the back there were gliding red and white lights. it then glided across the sky after hovering for a moment. all the way through martinsville and indianapolis i continued to see them near the highway. there was even one over my neighborhood near the highway when i reached indianapolis.
    when i got home i continued to follow them and try to take pictures, but they weren't very clear photos. i have never seen any unidentified flying objects before! i was very surprised and it felt surreal. i found it odd that there were so many and all across the sky, and spread across such long distances.
content.summary: Triangular shaped, lit craft hovering in sky across many towns

content.detailedDescription:
Hello


briefly.... i have shared a relevant experience with family members a couple of days ago. this event occurred seven years ago in 2003, while living in mexicali. i was visiting cousins at their shop.

this was my first encounter seeing these vehicles which were very high above. i have seeing other types of ufo's previously in the past. i continue getting obvious flashes in the sky while taking early walks.

during this particular event in 2003, i was not alone. i happened to look up and coming over the tall wall, a straight object moving at a slower speed than a commercial jet, was flying toward me from the north. the i told the person next to me to look, and i pointed. he and the rest of the people with me saw the object halt, while a second one came into the picture (wide open roof) and did the exact same thing, a perfect stop, right next to the other. the objects where literally suspended straight up above us for about ten seconds, while a third one came into the picture, the first one started to move forward again, moving south. seconds later, the second did exactly same, while the third kept moving without stopping. this event lasted for less than a minute. these objects were materialized, not holograms. they made no sound. the color was grey white, enough to see the shape ( sharp right angles, no curves) llllllllllllllllllllllllll

i have seen other objects since, though not so formal ( pausing over head ), and so straight. the other experiences have been with bowl shape vehicles, hologram cylinder types, metallic hologram types....So many different obvious encounters.

the most common are the star like at night! the attachment are recent experiences. very consistent.


please advise if anyone is available for a private meeting. thank you!

regards
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Indirect communication from three unkown objects

content.detailedDescription:
First noticed as a reflection in front door window. turned to look at it and it was bright white traveling very slow. it appeared to be cigar shaped. my husband went and got a telescope. he said he thought it might have some very small wings, but could not tell for sure. we were watching some local sky divers, and plane flying in the area. what ever this was the plane , and sky divers didn't see it or wasn't aware of it. it seemed to be flying at the same level as the plane. we thought it was strange to be flying at the same time. we thought it might be a drone looking for marijuana.....Just a thought? we didn't have a camera at the time so no pictures. we have been looking for answers, and no one seems to have them.
thank you for letting us share this with you. we don't know what we saw but would love to know.

                       sincerly *(names of witnesses deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Bright white quiet, and traveling slow.

content.detailedDescription: We were in our driveway when my husband noticed a very bright light in the distance. it was kind of low in the sky. we were wondering what it could possibly be. too bright to be a planet/star or moon. maybe a plane? we stared for about 4 min. and it did not move at all. i was then getting very curious. i went in the house to get my video camera. when i came out i started recording. it then started to move a little and turn? not sure how to describe... the more i zoomed, the more it glared and then i started to notice it moving., so i would zoom out and just try to let the camera focus. it seemed to break into 2 lights then started changing colors. i noticed the colors red and green. the shape appeared to change, but now i'm wondering if maybe it was turning or something? it almost seemed to turn into a glowing ball at one point. it was the craziest thing we have ever seen. it kept getting out of our sight behing a rooftop, and we kept moving to see it. it finally got smaller and took off quickly. i have to say, i was a little concerned it might know i was video taping it. i have never really put much thought into ufo's before this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Egg,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Bright light appeared, not moving, then started shaking/moving and changing shapes

content.detailedDescription:
It was a friday evening and i was working my usual part time shift as a projectionist at a movie theatre. i had around 5 minutes before i had to start one of the last movies before a long break so i went out back just to get some fresh air.  it was dark outside when i went out and i was just looking around at my surroundings (a field, office buildings, a small back road) when i looked at the tree line and saw some odd lights in the distance above the tree line. they were four red lights forming the shape of a triangle (three lights forming the triangle and a fourth in the center of the triangle).  the lights did not blink or move, they stayed on the entire time and there was no movement for over one minute. i remember standing and thinking what could this thing be? i thought it could be a radio tower with a plane passing it in the distance.  
i stood there looking at this object trying to think of every possible solution to what it could be other than a ufo until it started to move. at that point i knew it was something very different.  the object slowly turned in the same spot where it was located, until the lights resembeled a vertical straight line. at this point the object looked like a straight line with three red lights.  when watching the object turn i did remember that all of the lights stayed on the entire time it turned. there were no lights that shut off or blinked. once the object was in the vertical stance for a moment, two of the lights slowly disappeared (the top and bottom lights leaving the center light on) until the final light in the middle vanished.   i am unsure if the lights turned off or if the object flew away.  i did not get any picture or video evidence of this because my phone was on my desk inside.  i tried to think of every possible flying object or radio tower that knew of to rule out a ufo, but this was just too odd. i did not think of myself as a believer in these things but i have changed my mind.  the entire incident lasted roughly around 3 minutes.
content.summary: Watched a triangle shaped object  hover a short distance away, turn, then vanish slowly into the distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my computer at 10 pm in looked out my front window to rest my eyes.The object was in the eastern sky. at first i thought it was the moon.But i said to myself,the moon doesn't have a beam of light comming out of it and going clear to the ground.It wasnt a plane nor a weather balloon or swamp gas.Like our government would of told me.When the object moved the light started to bend in an arch.More like a curved tail.I didnt have time to grab my good camera so i grabed my cell phone and got 4 pics of the object.The object went frm bright to dimn. then back to bright then it just was gone.Like someone would turn off a light switch in your home.Im 58 years old and thismy 3 rd sighting in ll those years this is the only one that have pisc to prove it.So i will send the pics to my home pc from my cell phone so ii can post them on this site.This is not the end of this. i have 2 other people saw the same object.But 3 years later.The wifewoke her husband up in the middle of the night so the wife could show her husband,she rembers it well,but her husband cant for some reason remember the sighting at all...More later..
content.summary: Circle in shape with a beam of light comming from object touching tge ground.

content.detailedDescription:
El d���a domingo como a la 1 del media d���a observe un punto en el cielo yo voy manejando  segu��� observ���ndolo, y en lado del esta otro objeto en forma de culebra  en un momento aparecieron 7 u 8 a su alrededor  unos parare cian como hala de parapente  y otro en puntos que se acercaban  y alejaban el punto de el centro no se mov���a pero el  de forma de culebra en ocasiones hacia forma de cruz o avi���n y se quedaba fijo y cuando hacia forma de culebra se mov���a de arriba hacia abajo .

me detuve a tomar fotos con una cama sony alfha 350 pero en modo automatico no pude tomar las fotos y lo intente muchas ocaciones . hasta que la puse en forma manual y enfoque manual los objetos.

me detuve para tomar mas fotos pero desasaparecieron de imediato.
content.summary: Objetos en veracruz

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside watching the sky and saw a star that didn't belong in the sky.
when i looked at it i saw that it was moving,north to south.
it moved very slow and after a couple of minutes it made a 110 degree turn to the east, it stopped, started to pulsate and then made a 90 degree turn to the south and increased it's speed to disappear after a short while.The event took about 30 minutes to complete.
content.summary: An object that looked like a star.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were moving from alabama to california, and we spent the night of september 29 in kingman arizona.  we left around 11am local time, and the time-stamp on the photographs says 1:36pm and was set to central time.  while he was driving the car down i40-west, i was taking photographs of the surrounding desert.  i'm not exactly sure if we were in arizona or california when i took those pictures, and i did not see anything myself when i was taking them.  when we were going over the photos of the trip on the computer later, i noticed that there was something unusual in them, and my husband suggested that i send the photos in here.
content.summary: Two disc-shaped objects over arizona-california desert

content.detailedDescription: Coming out of store looked up seen small plane with something under it #1 when looking at that four bright orange yellow round lights flashed on hovering in the air all planes moving but lights not moving then turned off seen black object hovering then lights came on again then went out never at the same time went out , you can see an object sitting in the sky broad daylight when it wanted to it would disappear and reappear ,watch it for 15- twenty minutes trying to get closer to get beter look on foot .Ask person walking across parkinglot how many light did they seee they said four .These lights where bright and not far away .After alot of helicopters where flying around ,went home to get caera and girlfriend when i returned watched but nothing wss there any mor but still alot of helicopters with flashing lights
content.summary: Phenix lights in nj

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking west on olympic blvd near flower street when i glanced up past the petroleum building (west).  through the la live spotlights and over the roof of the petroleum building there appeared what i initially thought was just stars.  then the "stars" started growing brighter in clusters of two or three.  i discerned a string like pattern (almost like connect the dots) with various "stars" illuminating.  i did not discern any pattern, though groups of two or three "stars" appeared to shine with greater intensity, sometimes towards the front of the "string", then "stars" towards the back of the string would intensify shortly after the last group dimmed (but remained visible).

the whole string appeared to move very slightly, perpendicular to the lines of planes heading for lax.  i used the flag posts on the top of the petroleum building as a reference point.  the "string" appeared about three times the apparent diameter of the moon.  it was not a straight line, but was an almost tree like assembly of "stars" which seemed to extend straight then loop around at the back.  it did not appear to me that the la live spotlights were illuminating the string.  from my vantage point the string appeared two or three times higher than jets inbound to lax on the typical night western to eastern trajectory (where they typically loop around and land to the west going into lax.)

i observed the "string" for about two minutes and concluded it could be a group of star like objects flying together, as i was unable to discern any structure connecting the independent white points of light.  what really struck me as odd was how only two or three of the stars would grow in intensity, then fade (though remain still visible) and then a few moments a different set of two or three "stars" would grow in intensity for a couple of seconds, with the whole lot (about 10-15) remaining visible throughout.  the "stars" that intensified were always clumped in adjacent groups of two or three (i.E. if the lights in front intensified, the ones ion back remained constant). 

i walked past the petroleum building to see if the string would be visible from a different vantage point.  it was not.  i then returned to my original vantage point but could not see the string at all.  a minute or two later two strobing red lights were seen, which moved like aircraft.  these lights flew past the area where the string had been, then looped back around (after a couple of minutes).

overall this was a very odd experience.  there is always a lot of air traffic at night over downtown los angeles, but i've never seen anything like this before.  i do not think this was a single object, but multiple.  they appeared at high altitude and became invisible after a couple of minutes.  during the time they were visible, the truly odd thing was how some increased (flashed) in intensity, as described above.
content.summary: String like collection of multiple star like points of light visible briefly from downtown la

content.detailedDescription: Driving home with my 16yr daughter and friend, @ approx 2:15am, westbound on kuebler blvd at lone oak rd se approx 45 mph, spotted object/bright light that 'appeared' in sw sky to the left of drivers window, low in the sky, below venus, closer to earth rather than faraway feel, flight appeared downward, object was pointed at front with red light on 'nose', had three pronged tail, yellowish in color, very bright, we all said "hey do you see that - what is that?" - it moved across/coming down-west for approx 10 sec., now in front of us - then disappeared from sky/sight. weather was partly cloudy, clouds moving quickly across sky, which opened up to crisp night sky in fall in pnw this time of year.
content.summary: Spotted in sw sky traveling westbound on kuebler blvd

content.detailedDescription:
My brother from texas was visiting and we are not new to encounters.  i was driving and showing him around the city in hammond.  then, i noticed a very bright orange/white (firey) light in the sky and quickly thought it was very unusual.  i pointed it to my brother and pulled over the street to see what it was.  we both witnessed the light of the space craft, which came to a complete hault, flying horizontally (approximately 15,000 feet)and not in an arch(as fireworks would) but then split into three(3) cone like lights and sped-up in one zig-zag motion pausing almost still like in 30degree angles then took off horizontally east-bound (almost like around gary airport in indiana) so those guys or tower people must have witnessed it themselves- like nothing on earth we've seen or flying crafts like jets or hilicopters could.  my brother and i both were very excited but knew our spouces would not believe because "seeing is believing"...
i quickly tried to follow by turning east-bound onto streets but a couple of blocks later we lost them.  on our way back, a police patrol car was parked and we were tempted to pull over and inform authorities of our sighting but decided to go back home and turn tv, radio, computer internet, etc., to see if anyone had reported this event.  no one did but we know we were not the only ones witnessing this sighting.
in past, we have witnessed other closer sightings in nm, and tx.  i am not dissapointed in the fact our spouses did not believe us because we witnessed the sighting and that's all that matters to us or me, personally.

i could not take photos since it happened so fast. if there is a next time, i hope to react swiftly by snapping pictures with phone.
content.summary: Flying horizontally single craft then split into 3 triangle and sped up fast

content.detailedDescription: As i live by an airport i look up alot as planes are arriving....I was with my fiancee and we in the car heading towards the airport and over the bay near the navy base was a cigar shaped object....White and silver in color...Reflective but not too bad as it was not overly sunny. the object did not have wings,tailfin or lights......It moved faster than a normal aircraft into a single cloud and never reappeared until a half mile later and then was on opposite side of car....No noise was heard....I see alot of planes everyday as i work at night...This did not have the characteristics of a normal craft...I was absolutely floored and this event has lead me to believe for sure that we are not alone.....This also witnessed by my fiancee.....
content.summary: Saw a cigar shaped object in broad daylight

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were walking around the pearl street mall in boulder sunday afternoon looking at children in their costumes. we were standing at the intersection of pearl street and 14th street looking east. i noticed several balloons were being released into the sky and i was trying to see how high they would go. there were several gliders flying around also that day from the nearby airport, and occasionally caught a few glimpses of the sun gleaming off of them as they very slowly cruised across the sky. 

as i was watching one of the gliders, i saw what looked like a shooting star or meteorite travel right behind the glider, as it was very bright and possibly a little yellowish in color. there was no noise. i thought maybe it was a balloon, but then thought there's no way it could travel that fast across the sky... but maybe its really windy up there. it had traveled about two or three widths of my hand across the sky in less than a second (measured with my arm fully extended out.) it was really small and hard to see, maybe like trying to look at a star during the daytime. this object seemed to fade in and then fade away as if it was a light that went out, maybe it went behind some moisture in the air but it looked as if it was gone. right after i was thinking maybe it was a shooting star, about a half second after that it reappeared and went back the direction in which it came at the same speed and disappeared again. there was no trail like i have seen on shooting stars thought. next, i couldn't tell if it disappeared or if i'd lost track of it as it was so small it was hard to see. at this point i thought a balloon couldn't have back tracked that quickly. maybe they were satellites i thought. 

at this point i told my girlfriend to look up at the sky in the direction of the phenomenon to see what she though, while she didn't see anything she said it was probably a balloon. as i kept an eye on them i now saw two of these objects fly across the sky side-by-side about two finger widths apart, definitely not balloons flying in formation. i pointed to the area again as one or two of them continued to move around the sky in large arcs, fading in and out and zig zagging through the sky. she said that she also saw them move quickly and zig zag and doubted they could be balloons, but refrained to say what she thought they were. i guess the range of the sky they were moving in was approximately a four foot square area at arms length, enough to need to turn my head a bit to watch, maybe a larger area as i lost track of them several times. it was a comforting feeling to me that she saw them also. towards the last few minutes of watching them they were moving at what seemed like large distances in a very short amount of time. based off of seeing the latest military jets at the local air show this summer, there's no way they were conventional aircraft. they (or one of them) seemed to get closer and further away and at times seemed as i could barely see them. at one point the object slowed down momentarily and appeared to get bright yellow-orange while it sparkled like a star, and appeared to be approximately the size of the largest star in the sky i've seen at night, at this point it kind of looked like a mini sun. they just seemed to fade away and we never saw them again.

it was pretty exciting to see what ever phenomenon this was. the fact that at least two of these lights flew together makes be believe it was intelligently controlled, but by who?
content.summary: Luminous orbs at high altitude dart around daytime sky above boulder

content.detailedDescription: It was a bright, clear, sunny day in tempe, arizona. i left my apartment riding my bicycle directly eastward just after crossing the street to ride on the sidewalk.  in the east sky about 40 degrees up i noticed a silver inverted pie shaped craft gliding across the sky for about 15 seconds, then i went under a tree  which obscured my veiw for about 2 seconds. after i emerged from my blocked sight, the craft was completely gone. disappeared. the object was about the size of the moon in the sky. i happened to notice this easily because i live in the flight path of sky harbor airport in phoenix. the craft was flying north to south, which i���ve never really seen before. the planes usually fly east to west. the craft might have been in phoenix flying space going in the wrong direction
content.summary: Inverted pie-shaped craft vanishes in sunny, bright arizona skies

content.detailedDescription:
Pretty much been seeing these cigar shaped white objects with no wings and a propellar.... thinking they are uav but i did see one vanish instantly yesterday...This is why im posting my pix of them now..A guy just reported similar things *(link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg).


feel free to get ahold of me, i have quite a few unknown pix and would love to sort them out!


moved rights to left, appeared to have no wings, flew straight as an arrow, no contrails what so ever, silent
content.summary: Been seeing daily what i think are uav silently flying straight paths appear to have propeller no wings

content.detailedDescription: I was at our vacation trailer on the wolf river about a mile down river from fremont, wi. (20 miles west of appleton,wi.). it was dusk. the sky was clear, stars were very very faint. i was facing southeast, a planet was the brightest object in the sky (venus?) it was this planet i was looking at. it wasn't dark yet (azure skies).The planet was off my 2o'clock the object came into view off my right shoulder slightly below the planet. it was as bright as the planet and about the same size. the planet was a brilliant white while the object was more like a dirty white.It moved in a straight path in a northerly direction from my right shoulder to my nose. the motion was odd, more like quickly floating horizontily then being propelled. it reminded me like letting a helium balloon go and watching it go skyward but on a horizontil plane. i watched it for 30 sec. to 1 min. it didn,t waver or strobe or flash. i wasn,t overly concerned when i saw it at first thinking it was a plane until i realized the speed and altitude were wrong then i thought it was weird (different). i continued to observe the object until like i said it got to about my 12 o'clock and it went out. it was like someone flipped a switch it just went out. it was well above the horizon and tree line across the river, no clouds or anything to obstruct my view. it didn't go up or down left or right it just went out and the sky where it was was empty. i live near the airport in racine, drive past the airport in milwaukee daily, drive past the eaa airport in oskosh almost every weekend from spring to fall, in all types of weather and different times of day or night and i have never witnessed anything like this. this is a rural area no city lights or abundent air traffic. i wasn't afraid or in awe. my feeling was that this is really weird. i didn't do anything but stand there and watch. i am an avid fisherman and fish in daylight and dark and because of this area being a major wetlands i am also familiar with different types of birds and there habits.
content.summary: Watched glowing sphere move across sky until it just went out

content.detailedDescription: Small white object with a small trail behind it. no visible wings, no sound. moving very fast with another object of same type close behind it.
content.summary: Small object with no wings, no sound with a second one following right behind it.

content.detailedDescription: Was visiting friends in the country *(names deleted--cms/sg)they started fighting so i went outside on the front porch i started seeing flashing lights in the sky  i thought they were moving stars they were so far away. they started going sideways up and down back and forth and i started flicking my lighter at them and then i saw them form into one object next thing i know it was hovering over my head there was no wind no heat no breeze from this object the colors were magnificent colors i have never seen before i was scared i was at edge of porch and started backing up towards front door and thats all i remember.Then coming back into the house and everyone was sleeping it was like dusk.
content.summary: Seen 3 objects go into 1 and 1 hovered above my head

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my friend to finish his dinner so i stayed outside in the garden.I decided to lie down on the lawn looking up into the sky,which was broken clouds with large patches of blue,when i noticed several,what seemed like large white spheres revolving around in a circle.I'm not very good at judging hieghts but they were high above the clouds.The strange thing is they appeared to fade in and out as they revolved.They were still there when i left to go home.I wrote a letter to ufo society at the time but didn't hear anything more,so i forgot all about it until i watched a tv program about the work that you do
content.summary: A number of spheres revolving in a circle

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2:30 p.M. on october 15, 2010, i was driving northbound on bob hope road in rancho mirage, california.  i happened to just look up into the sky noticing how clear and blue it was.  suddenly i saw a white sphere coming from the southwest.  i thought it looked funny because there were no ���wings or tail��� that an airplane would have.  it was small���i can only describe it as the same size as a large star you would see at night.  there was no sound or contrails coming from it.  the first white object was zipping very fast, just like a ���shooting star���, but it was flying straight, even with the horizon, not shooting down in an arc motion as a star would.  then, another white sphere came speeding from the same southwest direction right along side the first one.  the second one neared the first one, it was getting closer and closer to it���i wanted to see if they would ���join or connect��� with each other, but they disappeared behind some puffy clouds off into the northeastern distance.  by this time, i was at a stop light and the light turned green, so i had to drive ahead. these objects moved so quickly, i didn't have my camera with me, but i don't think i'd even have time to grab a camera and try to videotape them.
content.summary: 2 white spheres speed across the sky
